group_1.textCenter: Hey, Coordinator! I came by to give my@regards before the new year... [chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:101001:motion_400][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1][chara:101００01:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: What's up? [chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:100901:motion_400][chara:100901:cheek_0][chara:100901:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100901:lipSynch_1][chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Momoko, wha―HUH?!

group_1.textRight: Whoooa! The Coordinator's shop is sparkling@clean!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, hello there, ladies! Welcome♪

group_1.textRight: I got some new-found respect for ya,@Coordinator! The place is spic-and-span!
I didn't think you had it in you...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* Why, thank you for the compliments.

group_1.textRight: Did you do this all by yourself?!

group_1.textLeft: Goodness, no. I had help from Sasara and@a few of the other girls.
Thank you.
Now that the cleaning is done, I'd like to @try my hand at making New Year's food!
Uh oh...

group_1.textRight: Then it's a New Year's food party this year!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha?!
A party?

group_1.textRight: I was sure you would host a party or have@something planned, Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: A party, hmm... That might be nice.

group_1.textRight: What? With how much you like doin' events,@a party didn't cross your mind?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
I've been busy with my Coordinator work@recently.
There hasn't been any time for me to come up@with party ideas or anything.

group_1.textRight: Sorry for us three all droppin' in on ya...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's nothing to worry about. My doors@are always open to customers.
The more I have, the more I make!♪

group_1.textRight: Well, that's...a nice way to look at it.

group_1.textLeft: Um...Momoko, Rena? A moment?
I think we should come up with a special@surprise for Mitama.

group_1.textCenter: Come up with something? Like what?

group_1.textLeft: To repay her for all she's done for us.
I want to give her something that will really@make her smile!

group_1.textCenter: We could give her a shoulder rub or @something.

group_1.textRight: Surely ya can do better than that, Rena.

group_1.textCenter: *Sigh* That sure was a busy day.
(My shoulders are stiff as a board.)

group_1.textLeft: *Pant* Phew...
Kanagi...and Konomi?!
What in the world is going on?
